items.title: Chemical Process Hazards Analysis with OSHA Safety Standards
items.headline: HAZOP, What If, Fault Tree Analysis FTA, Failure Mode & Effect Analysis FMEA with practical examples for SAFE operation
objectives_summary: Learn the key steps and procedure to systematic identification of hazards and related accident scenarios
Know, Understand and Implement the provisions of the OSHA's Process Safety Management of Highly Hazardous Chemicals Standard – PSM Rule (29 CFR 1910.119)
Gain a clear understanding of the key components of Process Safety Methods for process hazards analysis (HAZOP, FMEA, FTA, What-If, Checklist…)
